oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Finite element methods with numerical quadrature for parabolic integrodifferential equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PANI, AK
PETERSON, TE
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: error estimate
finite element
integrodifferential equation
nonsmooth data
numerical quadrature
parabolic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the effect of numerical quadrature in space on semidiscrete and fully discrete piecewise-linear finite dement methods for parabolic integrodifferential equations. We give error estimates for both smooth and nonsmooth initial data. Our results generalize those obtained for the lumped mass method.
